appName.message: Esboço de Chat para o Gemini

appDescription.message: Navegue rapidamente pelos seus chats do Gemini com um esboço clicável. Nunca mais se perca em conversas longas.

emptyTocMessage.message: Nenhuma consulta de usuário encontrada neste chat ainda.
emptyTocMessage.description: Message displayed when the table of contents is empty.

attachmentLabel.description: Label for TOC items that are file attachments instead of text.

clickToPin.description: Tooltip for the entry icon when the outline is not pinned.

unpin.description: Tooltip for the entry icon when the outline is pinned.

askGemini.description: Button text for the quick quote feature.

regardingThis.description: Hidden text prepended to the user's input when using the quick quote feature.

enableQuickQuoteLabel.description: Label for the toggle switch in the popup.
